        Learn the best split.
        Specified by:

      • getSplitAndIndex

        protected abstract UnivariateSplit getSplitAndIndex(int f)
        This method should be overwritten to compute the best split for a particular feature.
        Parameters:
        f - a feature of tree.getData() for which we compute the best split on only points in tree.getSampleIds()
        Returns:
        an array of two elements
        1. the value leading to the best split
        2. the corresponding metric value
        Preconditions:
        The current object is initialized. This should only be called with features in tree.getMtryVars()
